name: Narasinga Lokesh Cherukuri
title: Cloud & DevOps Engineer | Platform & Site Reliability Specialist
summary: Versatile Cloud and DevOps Engineer with 4+ years of professional experience in designing scalable cloud infrastructure, automating CI/CD pipelines, and improving system reliability across AWS, Azure, and GCP. Known for delivering resilient platforms, migrating legacy systems to modern cloud-native stacks, and driving cost optimization through automation and observability. Master’s in CS, strong startup exposure, and proven leadership on multi-cloud projects.

education.institution: Gandhi Institute of Technology and Management

roles.title: Senior Software Engineer – Cloud and DevOps Consultant
highlights: Re-architected on-prem legacy systems to modern AWS infrastructure using EKS, Terraform, and CI/CD pipelines for Vittoria Coffee.
Led cloud migration and observability for United Airlines using Azure and Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK Stack.
Built multi-cloud DevOps pipelines integrating Jenkins, GitLab, ArgoCD, and Terraform for hybrid deployments.
Defined SLOs, built chaos engineering practices with AWS FIS, and acted as SME for DevSecOps practices.
Containerized and orchestrated large-scale apps using Docker and Kubernetes across AWS, Azure, and GCP.
Enabled ML infrastructure automation and high-availability deployments for AI workloads on AWS.

roles.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Developed MEAN stack applications with cloud-native architecture on AWS.
Implemented CI/CD using Azure DevOps and GitHub Actions.
Contributed to Kubernetes-based deployments and infrastructure monitoring.
Built automations using Bash, Python, and Terraform to support cloud environments.

roles.title: Software Developer Intern
highlights: Worked on internal tooling using MEAN stack.
Implemented AWS Lambda-based automation for alerting and monitoring.

experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
highlights: Deployed ML models on AWS Lambda for scalable inference.
Improved accuracy with advanced preprocessing and visualization pipelines.

projects.name: Promptfolia
projects.description: An AI-powered interactive resume deployed on Google Cloud Run with Flask backend and Docker. It uses Google Generative AI to answer recruiter queries about your resume in real-time.
projects.value: Tripled recruiter engagement and improved portfolio clarity.

projects.name: Multi-Cloud 3-Tier Infrastructure
projects.description: Built reusable Terraform modules to deploy secure 3-tier architectures (web/app/db) across AWS, Azure, and GCP with cost-optimized networking and VM provisioning.

projects.name: AskPDF – AI Document Query System
projects.description: Developed a tool to query PDF content using OpenAI and FAISS vector DB. Deployed on AWS with Docker and FastAPI.

projects.name: Legacy Website Migration
projects.description: Migrated on-prem corporate sites to cloud (AWS, Azure, GCP) with HA architecture, DNS migration, and observability dashboards.

projects.name: CI/CD & Monitoring Platform
projects.description: Implemented GitOps-based CI/CD pipelines and integrated observability using Prometheus, Grafana, and Loki for real-time insights and availability.
